group_1.textCenter: My apologies for summoning you all@on such short notice.

group_1.textLeft: And thank you for providing us with@a meeting place, Yakumo.

group_1.textRight: Oh my, it's no trouble! I'm an Eastern Magical Girl@myself, after all.
So, did you have something important you needed@to tell us...?
Sumimasen...
I just tagged along with Riko. Are you sure it's okay@for me to be here?

group_1.textLeft: You're a student at Kosho Academy,@so you're hardly an outsider.

group_1.textRight: What if we're not Union members...?

group_1.textLeft: That's fine.
This gathering...is to decide who will succeed me@as the Union's Eastern leader.
I thought all of you should know that, seeing as@we're from the same side of town.

group_1.textRight: N-now hold on a second! I've never heard anything@about this!

group_1.textLeft: Mm. This is the first time I've brought it up.

group_1.textRight: Why're you making such a huge choice@all by yourself?!

group_1.textLeft: I mean, I haven't decidedâ€”

group_1.textRight: Did you know this already, Sis?!

group_1.textLeft: ...No, this is the first I've heard of it as well.

group_1.textRight: I'm against it...!
M-me too...!
What brings this on, all of a sudden...?!

group_1.textLeft: Settle down...

group_1.textRight: But I can't believe you're quitting as our leader,@Kanagi...
Um, maybe we should give her a chance@to explain...?
Right? Let's hear her out first!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks, you two...@For keeping the situation in check.
We'd be in good hands with someone capable of@making calm decisions at the top.

group_1.textRight: N-no way...!@I'm absolutely not cut out for that...
But that's beside the point...@Please give us the full story...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Right.
Despite being the leader of the East,@I sided with the Neo-Magius.
I've no doubt that the fact that I tried to destroy@Kamihama is still fresh in your minds.

group_1.textRight: Are you saying you're gonna take responsibility@and quit?
'Cause if that's the case...
We'd be happy to team up with you again, Kanagi.
Or are you gonna keep brooding about the need@for a clean slate?

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:0.8][chara:101601:cheek_1][chara:101601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json][chara:101601:eyeClose_1][chara:101601:lipSynch_1]I am not.
Thank you, everyone...
I remember that like it was yesterday.
Thanks to you, I was able to get a fresh start@as an individual.
This is a separate matter, however.
I was never voted into a leadership role.
That's why I felt I should take the opportunity@to pass the mantle to the next generation...
I wanted to hear what the rest of you@thought of that.

group_1.textRight: So it's not that you don't like being the boss?

group_1.textLeft: Hm, well, love it or hate it, I'm not sure if@I'm suited to the position.

group_1.textRight: But if you don't know how you feel, then...

group_1.textCenter: (I get the sense that everyone wants her to stay...)
How did you become the leader of the East anyway,@Kanagi?

group_1.textLeft: That's abrupt.

group_1.textRight: I mean, being told to take on such a job@so suddenly... Wouldn't it bother you?
I was just wondering what your experience was like.
Plus, you know...
Didn't you say that you'd gone to the Memory@Museum to look back on your roots?

group_1.textLeft: ...That's true; most of the Magical Girls who know@about those days are no longer with us...

group_1.textRight: Aren't you girls itching to hear about it?
Sure am!

group_1.textLeft: Very well...

group_1.narration: "I had visited the Memory Museum to reflect@on how I became the leader of the East."
"As a matter of fact,@it was sheer happenstance@that I came into the position."
"I suppose the simplest way to explain it@would be to begin with@my early days as a Magical Girl..."
"Back when I made my contract,@it came as a great shock to me to learn@that there was no explanation for why the West@disliked my beloved Eastern side of town..."

group_1.textCenter: (...fears and disparages the East more than@I ever thought possible,)
(despite the fact that we've done nothing@in the present day to deserve it...)

group_1.textLeft: ...Found you.

group_1.narration: "To fight as a Magical Girl in the face@of such a harsh, unshakable reality,@where I'm hated and avoided for no reason..."
"That is to say, I found comfort@in defeating dangerous Witches@and protecting the lives of humans,@as it let me keep the East safe."
"There wasn't a doubt in my mind that the@other Eastern Magical Girls felt the same."

group_1.textLeft: This should keep me going for a while...

group_1.textRight: Are you alright?!@Did a Witch do this to you?

group_1.textLeft: No...@It's...about my territory...!

group_1.textRight: Your territory...?

group_1.textCenter: Are you the backup she called for?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101600:effect_7000_attack01]Well, that ain't gonna matter if you're both@weak-ass rookies!

group_1.textRight: Aren't you a Magical Girl yourself?!@What in the world are you doing...?!

group_1.textLeft: Hah? Don't go mouthin' off to people@with more experience.

group_1.narration: "Even the Magical Girls who were supposed@to be protecting the Eastern wards together@were locked in turf wars.@I could hardly say that we were united@in keeping our side of town safe."
"When I became a Magical Girl,@I found out why the East was hated so much.@Along with discovering the infighting@between Eastern Magical Girls..."
"I started to think,@'At the very least,@the East should be united as one.'"

"The combination of the prejudice against the East@and the chaos amongst the Magical Girls of my side@of town made me lose my composure at the time,@and drove me to act in a more aggressive,@militant way than I do now."
